demo.name: brd4151a.demo.rcp-spi-802154
demo.label: Multiprotocol (OpenThread+Zigbee) - RCP (SPI)
demo.model:description: This multiprotocol radio co-processor (RCP) application supports running OpenThread and Zigbee stacks simultaneously on a host processor. It uses concurrent multiprotocol (CMP) / multi-PAN functionality to run the 802.15.4 networks simultaneously on the same channel. The host stacks and the RCP communicate using the Co-Processor Communication protocol (CPC), which acts as a protocol multiplexer and serial transport layer. The host applications connect to the CPC daemon, which in turn connects to the EFR via a SPI link. Refer to *AN1333: Running Zigbee, OpenThread, and Bluetooth Concurrently on a Linux Host with a Multiprotocol Co-processor* for more information on running the multiprotocol RCP with different host applications.

property.value: Multiprotocol (OpenThread+Zigbee) - RCP (SPI)
Capability|Multiprotocol Device\ Type|RCP Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Thread Wireless\ Technology|Zigbee

demo.name: brd4161a.demo.rcp-spi-802154-blehci
demo.label: Multiprotocol (OpenThread+Zigbee+BLE) - RCP (SPI)
demo.model:description: This multiprotocol radio co-processor (RCP) application supports running OpenThread, Zigbee, and Bluetooth stacks simultaneously on a host processor. It uses concurrent multiprotocol (CMP) / multi-PAN functionality to run the 802.15.4 networks simultaneously on the same channel, and dynamic multiprotocol (DMP) to run the Bluetooth Link Layer simultaneously. The host stacks and the RCP communicate using the Co-Processor Communication protocol (CPC), which acts as a protocol multiplexer and serial transport layer. The host applications connect to the CPC daemon, which in turn connects to the EFR via a SPI link. Refer to *AN1333: Running Zigbee, OpenThread, and Bluetooth Concurrently on a Linux Host with a Multiprotocol Co-processor* for more information on running the multiprotocol RCP with different host applications.

property.value: Multiprotocol (OpenThread+Zigbee+BLE) - RCP (SPI)
Capability|Multiprotocol Device\ Type|RCP Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Thread Wireless\ Technology|Zigbee

demo.name: brd4161a.demo.ot-ble-dmp-no-buttons
demo.label: OpenThread BLE DMP (No buttons) - SoC FreeRTOS
demo.model:description: This is a simple application to test DMP (Dynamic MultiProtocol) with OpenThread and Bluetooth running on FreeRTOS. It is identical to the ot-ble-dmp application with the exception that support for buttons has been removed. This application is meant to be used for boards which don't have buttons.

property.value: OpenThread BLE DMP (No buttons) - SoC FreeRTOS
Capability|Multiprotocol Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Thread
